data.title: Savyasachi director reveals why the film is flop and his friendship with Chaitu
data.meta_description: Savyasachi director reveals why the film is flop and his friendship with Chaitu Karthikeya 2, Chandoo Mondeti, Naga Chaitanya
data.text:
Chandoo Mondeti is a talented director and there is no doubt in that. He has delivered one of the stunning movies for TFI with Karthikeya. He continued the success with Premam which has Naga Chaitanya in lead role as well. However Chandoo Mondeti like any other director has faced flop. He has teamed up for second time with Chaitu for Savyasachi.

The film ended up as a disappointment. Chandoo Mondeti revealed that there were blunders from his side which made the film flop.

The decisions I had taken as a director failed miserably. However my friendship with Chaitu is intact. He calls me occasionally and we talk about interesting stuff going on.
